citations.narrative:
Drainage and waste disposal. There are wet and damp areas in the front sections of the two outdoor enclosures for the
capuchins. The areas are muddy below the water receptacles. Housing facilities for non-human primates must be
constructed and maintained so that waste and water are rapidly eliminated to prevent pest problems, insects, odors, and
disease risks. Correct by improving drainage in these two capuchin enclosures so that water is rapidly eliminated. Correct
by October 15, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.75(f) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
Drainage and waste disposal. There are wet and damp areas in the front sections of the two outdoor enclosures for the 
capuchins. The areas are muddy below the water receptacles. Housing facilities for non-human primates must be 
constructed and maintained so that waste and water are rapidly eliminated to prevent pest problems, insects, odors, and 
disease risks. Correct by improving drainage in these two capuchin enclosures so that water is rapidly eliminated. Correct 
by October 15, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
